TopicTitle: S3 KS-25 engine missing top node?

Articles.Content:
I am currently on latest version, sub version 1028. Windows 8.1 64 bit running 32 bit KSP.

Mods installed:
Space Y
Modular Rocket System
Alarm Clock
SCAN-Sat
Remote Tech
Kerbal Engineer Redux
Procedural Fairings
Procedural Parts
Kerbal Attachment System + KIS
Sounding Rockets

All up to date.


Issue:
In sandbox mode (have not unlocked the engine in career mode yet), the S3 KS-25 engine is missing the top attachment node. Bottom node is there and it works. I can attach the top end of the engine to surfaces other than nodes but not to other nodes. Is this a bug or intended? A google search came up empty. I read the wiki and was under the impression there should have been a top end node on that engine. Edited November 16, 2015 by LN400
Changed prefix to Solved
It definitely has a top node, it's buried a bit in the model so that you can angle the engine without it showing a gap.
Thanks for the reply. I will start the game up again and have a look at it.
Remember the hold the Mod key (Alt in windows) to force node snap.

Again, thanks. I just fired it up again and sure enough, it was there. As you said, buried deep but still there, now attaching as it should. Force node snap seems to be a very good idea for this part.
